parameters.query: ={{ `SELECT n.article, n.name, n.category, p.price, p.in_stock, p.product_url, o.name as outlet, p.updated_at FROM lcdstock_nomenclature_v2 n JOIN lcdstock_prices_v2 p ON p.nomenclature_id = n.id JOIN zip_outlets o ON o.id = p.outlet_id WHERE ${$json.article ? "n.article = '" + $json.article.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : "p.product_url LIKE '%" + $json.url.replace(/'/g, "''") + "%'"} ORDER BY p.updated_at DESC LIMIT 5;` }}
